title: Line of Succession
description: SEE WHY CRITICS CALL THE #1 BESTSELLING BLAKE CARVER SERIES "ADDICTIVE," "ASTONISHING" AND "IMPOSSIBLE TO PUT DOWN." In William Tyree’s chilling page-turner, the nation is rocked by a series of high-level assassinations so devastating that the magnitude is hidden from public view. As the Pentagon begins retaliating against Islamic radicals abroad, counter-terrorism agent Blake Carver soon realizes that his job isn’t as easy as hunting down a group of foreign extremists. This war isn’t about religion, foreign policy or oil. It’s up to Carver to stop a group of powerful Washington insiders battling over control of the planet’s most precious water.
author: William Tyree
